content.text:
Same! I felt really refreshed afterward, it was really great to audio-meet those of you I haven't spoken with before.

Also seconding the recommendation for Plumble, my audio hardware is constantly fighting my kernel (and losing), so I often do audio input/output on my phone. Enabling PTT was easy, although I'd recommend turning off the TTS unless you like hearing "waaaaaahoohh DEE" when someone types "wooooah :D".
